backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature addition to the StoreHome page and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend source files with short descriptions of their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a warm kirana-inspired theme with responsive mobile defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, PWA manifest links, icons, and root mounting point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest declaring app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icon assets.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and network-first fetch caching for offline support.
frontend/README-TWA-APK.md: Guide for packaging the PWA into an Android APK using Trusted Web Activity.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal component that renders the StoreHome page.
frontend/src/components/KiranaThemeNotes: Design system documentation detailing the kirana-inspired color, layout, and component guidelines.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and updates an actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes with mobile-friendly defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/StoreHome.tsx: Renders the storeâ€™s home page with header, hero section, categories, and featured product listings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors from CSS variables, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, issues, and requirements for building an Android-installable PWA version.
